bioconda.name: bioconductor-affyilm
bioconda.summary: Linear Model of background subtraction and the Langmuir isotherm

biotools.summary: Preprocessing tool which estimates gene expression levels for Affymetrix Gene Chips. Input from physical chemistry is employed to first background subtract intensities before calculating concentrations on behalf of the Langmuir model.

bioschemas.name: affyILM
bioschemas.summary: Preprocessing tool which estimates gene expression levels for Affymetrix Gene Chips. Input from physical chemistry is employed to first background subtract intensities before calculating concentrations on behalf of the Langmuir model.
